title: System Admin
description: Manage and monitor manual APIs for Tamabee Admin

groups.payroll: Process payroll payment and rollback payroll periods
groups.contracts: Check and update expired contract statuses

noLogs: No logs yet. Execute an API to see logs here.

payrollPayment.title: Payroll Payment Scheduler
payrollPayment.description: Process automatic payroll payment for companies on payment day

billing.title: Monthly Billing Scheduler
billing.description: Process monthly billing for all companies due for payment

contractExpiry.title: Contract Expiry Scheduler
contractExpiry.description: Check and update expired contract statuses, deactivate employees without active contracts

companyCleanup.title: Company Cleanup Scheduler
companyCleanup.description: Permanently delete inactive companies past retention period

tenantCleanup.title: Tenant Cleanup Scheduler
tenantCleanup.description: Archive tenant databases inactive past retention period (default 90 days)

rollbackPayroll.title: Rollback Payroll to DRAFT
rollbackPayroll.description: Reset payroll periods status to DRAFT for testing purposes
